page.title: 10Family Life.
page.content: Father,who is a cabinet maker,got up at 5 o'clock, had his breakfast and went to work.Mother was next up at 25 past 9.She had a drink and began to prepare dinner.The children got up at 10 o'clock.Only one had breakfast.The two children played games while mother finished preparing dinner.Dinner was at 12.45,after father had returned.He then went fishing with a friend while mother did the housework.The two children went out to play.An uncle came to visit them and all of them watched T.V. Mother washed her hair. The chlldren went to bed at 9 o'clock and the parents at 10.30. In one school 62 cildren out of 240 have moved into Pontefract during the last four years.This is mainly to be near work,or to be near their family. Andrea Dinsdale.
